sentence: Case in point: Rep. Paul Gosar last fall posted an animated video of him killing AOC–the ultimate takedown fantasy.
author: Howard Kurtz | Fox News
title: American Slapfest: How Will Smith reflects a smackdown culture

sentence: In court documents, Alexander’s lawyers have said he told congressional investigators that he remembers having “a few phone conversations” with Rep. Paul Gosar, R-Ariz., and had exchanged some text messages with Rep. Mo Brooks, R-Ala., in the run-up to the Jan. 6 rallies.
title: Reports: Trump Jr. sent White House chief of staff ideas to overturn 2020 election
